genesisNFTs.description: The very first NFT minted in the Semester Zero collection. A test mint that became a legendary artifact.
The second NFT ever minted in Semester Zero. Part of the original Genesis pair.

verification.note: Genesis status determined by NFT ID 0 or 1

collectorNotes: Only 2 Genesis NFTs exist in the entire collection
IDs cannot be replicated - these are forever the first two
Originally test mints that became permanent collection artifacts
Special historical significance as the collection's foundation
